headline: Atmos Energy Recognized on Forbes “America’s Best Employers” List for Fifth Consecutive Year
summary: Forbes Americas Best Employers Atmos Energy Recognized on Forbes Americas Best Employers List Dallas, Feb. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Along with Atmos Energy’s vision to be the safest provider of natural gas services is also to be recognized for being a great employer, and for the fifth consecutive year the company has done just that. Today Atmos Energy was recognized as a leading employer in the U.S. and in the utilities industry when it was named to the Forbes “America’s Best Employers” list
